miml.classifiers.miml.lazy

Class MLkNN_MIMLWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • miml.classifiers.miml.MIMLClassifier
      • miml.classifiers.miml.lazy.MultiLabelKNN_MIMLWrapper
        • miml.classifiers.miml.lazy.MLkNN_MIMLWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IMIMLClassifier, IConfiguration, mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearner

    public class MLkNN_MIMLWrapper
extends MultiLabelKNN_MIMLWrapper
    Wrapper for ML-kNN (Multi-Label k Nearest Neighbours) algorithm of Mulan Library. For more information, see:

    Min-Ling Zhang, Zhi-Hua Zhou (2007). ML-KNN: A lazy learning approach to multi-label learning. Pattern Recogn.. 40(7):2038--2048.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
